Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Agenda Center](https://cityofkilgore.civicweb.net/Portal/)

   Access easily searchable meeting agendas and minutes for various boards though our Agenda portal.
2. #### [Minutes Archives](https://cityofkilgore.civicweb.net/filepro/documents/5233/)

   Access easily searchable archived minutes for various boards, commissions, and committees.
3. #### [Boards & Commissions](https://cityofkilgore.com/241/Boards-Commissions)

   Find details about the boards and commissions that keep the City of Kilgore running.
4. #### [City Code](https://ecode360.com/KI6371)

   The City Code is the legal codification of all ordinances adopted by the City Commission and the more recently renamed City Council. The most current City Code can be viewed either at the Kilgore Public Library or the City Clerk's office.
5. #### [City Council](https://cityofkilgore.com/249/City-Council)

   Learn about the City Council of Kilgore Texas.
6. #### [City Manager](https://cityofkilgore.com/424/City-Manager)

   The City Manager serves as chief administrative and executive officer of the City and assures that all laws and city ordinances are enforced.
7. #### [City Clerk](https://cityofkilgore.com/423/City-Clerk)

   The City Clerk attends and records proceedings of official meetings of the City and is the manager and custodian of official records.
8. #### [City Attorney](https://cityofkilgore.com/422/City-Attorney)

   The City Attorney serves as the chief legal adviser of the City Council, of all offices, department, and agencies, and of all officers and employees in matters relating to their official powers and duties.
9. #### [Election Information](https://cityofkilgore.com/425/Election-Information)

   Learn about elections for City Council.
10. #### [Master Fee Schedule](https://cityofkilgore.com/DocumentCenter/View/4152/FY2025-Master-Fee-Schedule-Appendix-Clean)

    Access the City of Kilgore master fee schedule.
11. #### [Mission, Vision & Values](https://cityofkilgore.com/259/Mission-Vision-Values)

    Take a look at the mission, vision, and values statement for the City of Kilgore.
12. #### [Strategic Plan](https://cityofkilgore.com/389/Strategic-Plan)

    Access the City of Kilgore Strategic Plan

### Contact Us

1. **City of Kilgore**  
   815 N Kilgore Street  
   Kilgore, TX 75662   
   Phone: [903-984-5081](tel: 903-984-5081)

   By contacting us, you agree to receive SMS messages from the City of Kilgore. We will not send marketing messages and only contact you regarding the services requested.
